medical_history.chief_complaint: One day of pain in chest/epigastrum.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain began one day prior to the visit, waking the patient early in the morning. It radiated to the back. Concomitantly, the patient experienced diarrhea with multiple loose stools of light brown then green color. The patient took 2 Tylenol, which helped the pain, though discomfort remains significant.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of hypothyroidism (status post thyroidectomy), GERD, remote peptic ulcer disease, hypertension, high cholesterol.
